contest-event.event-date:
July 13, 1929 D Doncaster Contest
Doncaster Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
doncaster-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Glasgow Paddocks, Doncaster, Yorkshire Choice of test pieces: "Der Freischütz" or "Souvenir of the Opera". All the entrants chose the former.
Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4. March contest (own choice) 1st(£1.10s.) Yorkshire Main, 2nd(£1) Bentley. 9th annual contest promoted by Royal Infirmary Committee. 9 bands competed.
Oct. 8, 2013, 9:01 a.m. Aug. 17, 2016, 9:13 a.m.
1 Bentley Colliery W. Wormald
2 Bullcroft Miners Ambulance W. Park
3 Askern Colliery Band William Tams
4 Goldthorpe Band Thomas Allsopp
